body:
Support the actual scans done by the actual people by reading ad free here - https://mangadex.org/title/58252/love-limit-exceeded

These re-uploaders not only put watermarks and ads but also remove the credits...

Please support the scan group by reading in MangaDex
Is this manga another work from the author of Sweet Guy?
I love how misleading the cover image is. Also, why upload this all chopped up? You have the option to crop these pages.

If you... A) See any part of this comment, and... B) Have ever posted a comment suggesting that anyone's parents will die within 5 years...
Then your parents will die a horrible, agonizing death within 1 year. There is no way to undo this curse. Good job killing your parents.

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk
